title: Introducing: refinnej
content:
My Swedish isn’t as hot as it perhaps could be, so I can’t be entirely sure what refinnej’s bio says about her, however a quick Google translate suggests that ‘Hej.

Här kommer jag ladda upp grejer jag skrivit som jag inte riktigt vet vad jag ska göra av.’ roughly equals ‘Hey. Here I upload stuff I’ve written that I do not really know what to make of.’ Quite a fitting description for a collection of tracks that don’t really fit anywhere within the realms of normality, yet are all the more enchanting for it.

refinnej (Jennifer backwards, see, I could work that much out!) has little online presence, aside from a Bandcamp with half a dozen ambient recordings on, accompanied by over-exposed photographs. Mixing her own vocals with swirling dronescapes, refinnej’s compositions are ambitious and luxuriously refined. Check out a couple of her Grouper-esque pieces below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
